cab.content: A(This Document is *he Property ofHisinto^jjilitary Secret,708 From Viceroy, Army Department, 10th March 1918. 3103. Your telegram of 6th instant. Police force at Barkhan withdrewto Fort Munro in face of menacing attitude of Khetrans, and Barkhan wasafterwards looted by combined force of Harris and Khetrans. Punitiveforce equivalent to about mixed brigade is concentrating at Duki and expectsto advance into Marri country about 15th. Smaller force concentrating inDerajat, Fort Munro area, to deal with Khetran situation. A brigade,16th Division, being-mobilised in Lahore area to act as a reserve.
